name: MB Fuma - Straight Off The Boat Allla Brace Maduro Torpedo
additionalNotes: MB FUMA is a brand characterized by its eclectic style between its Italian origins and its rebelliousness in its luxury cigars. composed of designers, professionals and artists in the world of tobacco this brand provides an exceptional quality with its original essence in the tobacco industry with its traditional techniques that pay tribute to Italian craftsmanship so loved by everyone.
